summary: Teenager Diane Weaver lives with her abusive single father. A religious local boy is the only who wants to be her friend, but she doesn't like him as much as he does her. What no one realizes is how far the abuse goes.
cast: Janine Duvitski|Frank Mills|Paul Copley|Dee Anderson|Charles Bolton|Colin Higgins|Tim Preece|Peter-Hugo Daly|Peter Newby|Mario Renzullo|David Janson|Oliver Maguire
keywords: born out of incest|stillborn child|dark secret|sexual child abuse|father impregnates daughter
title: Diane
